items.text: length ball, from around the wicket. Lands on middle, and punched to mid on
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Porterfield, no run

items.text: full, just outside off, and defended off the front foot to the bowler
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Porterfield, no run

items.text: length ball on off, and worked off his pads to the leg side
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Porterfield, no run

items.text: swept! Full, angling down his legs, and he goes down on one knee to sweep behind square
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Porterfield, FOUR runs

items.text: appeal for lbw, but not given. Tries to sweep again, but hits his legs and rolls away to short fine leg
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Porterfield, no run

items.text: full, on off, and defended to the bowler again. Drinks
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Porterfield, no run

items.text: length ball, on off, and tapped off the back foot to the leg side
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Stirling, no run

items.text: slower ball, full on middle, and worked off his pads to midwicket on this occasion
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Stirling, 1 run

items.text: full, just outside off, and he prods forward to defend to cover
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Porterfield, no run

items.text: length ball, on off, and tapped with soft hands towards the off side. They hare across for one. Nice, early call this time
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Porterfield, 1 run

items.text: slower ball, back of a length on off, and he smothers an on-side flick off the back foot
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Stirling, no run

items.text: another offcutter to finish the over. Length ball outside off, and caressed through point
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Stirling, 1 run

items.text: worked away to the leg side
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Stirling, 1 run

items.text: length ball, from around the wicket, and landing on off. Flicked off the back foot to deep midwicket
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Porterfield, 1 run
